pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: Asambhinnena vilepanena is an unusual expression. According to Sp-t 3.1.357, asambhinnena means “with (make-up) not smeared, not lost”, amakkhitena, anaṭṭhena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: For an explanation of the renderings “bath powder” and “soap” for cuṇṇa and mattika respectively, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: For a discussion of the yojana, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
